content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings, Maryam. While discussing the rental price for this Munich apartment, let me emphasize getting the maximum value possible on my end. However, for this negotiation, only prices will be mentioned, avoiding lease terms or additional costs. If you propose an acceptable number, I'll say 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' If not, I might choose to end the negotiation with a reason. Let's begin.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for understanding. I want to rent the apartment for 500 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the proposed price significantly undervalues the property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. How about 800 euros per month?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of 800 Euro! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
